slides.description: Part list for the frame
Start with assembling the upper frame with 1160mm profiles (2) and 620mm profiles (4)
Connect the sides of the table with the 970 mm profiles (1)
Fasten the sides with corner elements (8)
Side elements should be attached to two corners each
Continue with the lower frame - 1100mm profile (3) and 620mm profiles (4) and three corner elements (8) for each side
Finally, drill the feet into the holes of the side profiles
Flip the table onto its feet, and adjust feet for firm stand
Part list for projector / camera mount
Start with the 450mm profiles (12)
Connect the 680mm profiles (13)
Add another 450mm profile (12) which will hold the camera later.
On the opposite side, connect the pivoting elements for the projector table (22) mounted on the 200mm profiles (14)
Continue with the base for the projector by connecting the 330mm (15) profiles and the 350mm profiles (16) with corner elements (25)
Attach another 330mm profile (15)
Connect the frames by inserting the small frame in the pivoting elements
Mount the projector onto the small frame by either using a custom plate or the optional ceiling mount, which can be disassembled and connected to the cross brace of the small frame
Use the 300mm profile (11) to mount the camera and its head to the frame
Both camera and projector should look inwards
Connect the projector / camera mount with the table
